text: Hey team, looking to work with Isabella Garcia for Telstra. Budget is approx $28,748 - need 2 x Instagram post, 1 x 2-minute tutorial, 2 x Lifestyle photography, 1 x LinkedIn post, 1 x 60-second YouTube video. 12 weeks exclusivity, 2 month engagement. Usage: 11 months. Start date: October 2025.
